original_text: And Samuel did that which the Lord spake, and came to Bethlehem. And the elders of the town trembled at his coming, and said, Comest thou peaceably?
korean_text: 사무엘이 여호와의 말씀대로 행하여 베들레헴에 이르매 성읍 장로들이 떨며 그를 영접하여 이르되 평강을 위하여 오시나이까

sentences.original_text: And Samuel did that which the Lord spake
And the elders of the town trembled at his coming
